import React, { useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import '../Authentification.css' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import StyledButton from '../../../Components/assets/StyledComponents/StyledButton.jsx' function Inscription() { const [inputs, setInputs] = useState({ lastname: "", firstname: "", email: "", password: "", dateOfBirth: "", address: "", }) const [err, setErr] = useState(false) const handleChange = e => { setInputs(prev => ({...prev, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}) ) } const handleClick = async e => { e.preventDefault() try{ await axios.post("http://localhost:4000/auth/inscription", inputs) } catch(err){ setErr(err) } } console.log(err) return (

Inscription

{err && err.response.data} S'inscrire

) } export default Inscription
